import React from "react"; import Chart from "../Chart/Chart"; import Card from "../UI/Card"; const ExpenseChart = (props) => { let sumOfExpenses = 0; const months = [ "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec", ]; props.expenses.forEach((expense) => { sumOfExpenses += expense.amount; }); console.log(sumOfExpenses); return (
{/* */}

{months[props.month]}

1000

{sumOfExpenses}

 {1000-sumOfExpenses}

Total Expenditure:
Total Budget:

); }; export default ExpenseChart;
